items.title: Real-time Collaboration
items.description: See everyone in the current document, and which field they are currently editing.

items.title: Organize documents with fields
items.description: Text fields offer full markdown support, while other types like images, files, and dates allow additional control and features.

items.title: Unlimited Projects
items.description: Each collection of documents is organized into a project. Grant access to team members and control API access per project. Create as many projects as you need.

items.title: Customizable access
items.description: Choose the people you need on your project. Grant them appropriate access roles (reader, contributor, admin)

items.title: Full API
items.description: Portway grants you access to the API which allows you to do anything with your content.

items.title: Structured text data
items.description: Markdown text can be consumed raw from the API, or you can use the pre-parsed structured text that turns text into a JSON structure for simple programmatic consumption.

items.title: Document outline
items.description: Name and reorder fields within your document in one efficient outline panel.

items.title: Inspired by notes apps
items.description: At its core, Portway is designed to be fast and simple. Create a document and start writing.

items.title: Project export
items.description: Need to move your content or want a project in plain text files? Download a zip of your project.

items.title: API keys
items.description: API access is controlled by project. Create a read-only key for a your website project so a static site generator gets read access. Create writeable keys to add content to a Portway project.

items.title: Search
items.description: Quickly find documents in a project using search.

items.title: Drag and drop import
items.description: Add content from outside sources by dragging it into a Portway project. It’s really that simple.

items.title: Webhooks
items.description: Notify other services when a Portway document is published. Trigger static site builds, post a document to Slack, or perform any other operation compatible with webhooks.

items.title: Global CDN
items.description: Any media you add to Portway is accessible via CDN, so you don’t need a separate asset hosting solution.

items.title: Security and Privacy
items.description: Your data belongs to you. We encrypt your data across the web and in our databases. We do not and will never sell your data, period. We minimize data sharing with third party services to those required to run and operate Portway. No one has access to your content except you and the Portway application.

items.title: Accessible on all devices
items.description: Portway works on your phone, tablet or computer.

items.title: Dark mode
items.description: Portway looks great whether you’re in dark or light mode.
